summary: HQ texture overhaul of Nordic Ruins, with some UV tweaks, plus a new meshes and textures for a candles :)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center]
[size=3][color=#cccccc][b]This is the first of a series of mods I'm planning to make in the near future.[/b][/color][/size]

[img]https://imgur.com/3m8ZtnY.png[/img]

[b][size=3][color=#cccccc]Straight from the Heart Quality texture overhaul of Nordic Ruins, with some mesh (UV) tweaks, plus a new meshes and textures for a candles, a new textures for a canopic jars, urns, traps, linens, sconces, dragon statues and a correct LOD textures.
[/color][/size][/b]

[img]https://imgur.com/W67EYkY.jpg[/img]

[img]https://imgur.com/m6yzBqa.jpg[/img]


[b][color=#9fc5e8]Hodilton video :[/color][/b]

[youtube]OtUcoscfC0M[/youtube]


Almost all the bitmaps are in 2K, a few in 4K (it was a conscious decision).

The new candle meshes take full advantage of the ENB SSS effect, so, of course, they look best with ENB.



[b][color=#cccccc]I don't want to bore you, see the images section for a more details :)
[/color][/b]


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/19365][size=4][color=#9fc5e8][b]SE Version here :)[/b][/color][/size][/url]


[b]Installation:[/b]

[color=#cccccc]Because I did a UV tweaks for a few meshes, changed a texture paths and have made a new mesh for a candles, install my mod after all the others, and during installation say yes to overwrite all the nif files.[/color]



[color=#cccccc][b]For the best visuals[/b] use ENB and ELFX with Enhancer (Interiors).[/color]



[size=2][color=#b6b6b6]A special thanks for Johnrose81, author of a Skyland series, for permission to use his assets. Finally I made my own, but really appreciate his kindness.[/color][/size][/center][/font]
author: Rudy102
